page.title: 04LETTERS FROM LOCAL NEWSPAPER
page.content: {*Are all children bad?}A concerned mother writes about the banning of all unaccompanied children from a local food store, due to vandalism and pilferage. "We should not tar them with the same brush" she writes. {*Another view - Do we need bombs?}Yes! Why? There would not be time to make them if we were being attacked. {*The re-opening of the Market {Harborough to Northampton Railway {Line}is a good idea because it will give another way to reach London, and allow shopping in Northampton and Milton Keynes. It will also provide work for local people. {*Can readers help raise Â£4,000}by supporting a sponsored parachute jump? 100 people will jump in aid of local underprivilaged children.{ {Class 2 Dunton Bassett Primary School { 1985
